199b3(nyi khri): bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
199b4(nyi khri): rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la po dag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod do//
199b5(nyi khri): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan
199b6(nyi khri): sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur
199b7(nyi khri): ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu
200a1(nyi khri): bsang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rdu yang dag par rjes sa ma mthong bas/ de la bdag ba thob byung/ bkra chub med 'thob bdang / ma 'dzags pa thob par rnam par/
200a2(nyi khri): spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/
200a3(nyi khri): bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar ma nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs
200a4(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngag yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am
200a5(nyi khri): lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par
200a6(nyi khri): rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi
200a7(nyi khri): nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/ / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan
200b1(nyi khri): par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin shes par rig pa bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/
200b2(nyi khri): don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/
200b3(nyi khri): don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang
200b4(nyi khri): zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas// la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang
200b5(nyi khri): bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin gshegs
200b6(nyi khri): pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa
200b7(nyi khri): gnyis pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes
201a1(nyi khri): su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar
201a2(nyi khri): gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan
201a3(nyi khri): tan du byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yang yeng por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud
201a4(nyi khri): de rim gror mi nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na yang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur
201a5(nyi khri): mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa zhi bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang
201a6(nyi khri): gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btung de rim gror mi nyan cing bka' zhan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang / des de bzhin
201a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro bar mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o//
201b1(nyi khri): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus
201b2(nyi khri): las mi 'dad pa ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
201b3(nyi khri): thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang lus kyi 'gyur ba yod mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o//
201b4(nyi khri): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i
201b5(nyi khri): dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas
201b6(nyi khri): pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/
201b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' 'o// ca co mi mnga' 'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga' 'o//
202a1(nyi khri): ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'a'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// dgongs pa yongs su
202a2(nyi khri): nyams pa mi mnga' 'o/ / ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mngar 'o// rnam par grol ba'i
202a3(nyi khri): ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o/ / sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes
202a4(nyi khri): sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i
202a5(nyi khri): ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/
202a6(nyi khri): de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa
202a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa dum bu tha ma/ bam
202b1(nyi khri): po ra brgyad pa/ / / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang
202b2(nyi khri): phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / mdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang
202b3(nyi khri): zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag baR+Ya drang por sleb pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang /
202b4(nyi khri): gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / ro stod seng ge lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par
202b5(nyi khri): grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang tshangs pa'i
202b6(nyi khri): dbyangs dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems shin tu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan
202b7(nyi khri): dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can/ lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams can
203a1(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am/ ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi
203a2(nyi khri): mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag
203a3(nyi khri): dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o/ / shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas/
203a4(nyi khri): mdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas/ sor mo ring ba'o// rting pa ring bas/ rting pa yangs pa'o// sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas/ sku che zhing
203a5(nyi khri): drang ba'o/ / pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas/ zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o//
203a6(nyi khri): ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa dang / smin ma dang / ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la/ rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas/ ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// baR+Ya drang
203a7(nyi khri): por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por sleb pa'o// glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su
203b1(nyi khri): nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas/ gser gyi kha dog go// gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms
203b2(nyi khri): pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/ sku la rdul gyis mi gos pas/ mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re re nas skyes shing gnyis su med pas/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su
203b3(nyi khri): 'khyil ba'o/ / me tog kun nga dang / zla ba dang // 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spas smin mtshams shin
203b4(nyi khri): tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stong che bas/ seng ge'i ro stong ngo // mgur dang rgyung legs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o// gser
203b5(nyi khri): gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam pa shes pa 'dra ba med pas/ ro gro
203b6(nyi khri): ba'i mchog go/ / sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas/ shing n+ya gro d+ha wAr chu zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub
203b7(nyi khri): la mdzes pa mnga' bas/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ut+pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas// ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o//
204a1(nyi khri): tshangs pa dang bya ka la bi kA lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas
204a2(nyi khri): seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/ / me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba'o// tshems la mtho dman med pas/ tshems mnyam pa'o//
204a3(nyi khri): tshems la mtshams ma dong las/ tshems thags bza' ba'o// bla 'og dgye dgu med pas/ tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar gnag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing / mdog dmar
204a4(nyi khri): pos ma yog pas/ spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma la bsu bskyal dang / chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang
204a5(nyi khri): gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten la sogs pa la bsti stang byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan pas/ zhabs shin tu
204a6(nyi khri): gnas pa ste/ de ni yid mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so// sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra
204a7(nyi khri): bar 'brel ba ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu
204b1(nyi khri): / mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa bkrol ba dang / sog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs
204b2(nyi khri): pas/ sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par
204b3(nyi khri): ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan la byin pa
204b4(nyi khri): dang / bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'gongs par gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas/
204b5(nyi khri): phyag brla drang por sleb pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang / gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i
204b6(nyi khri): spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang / gos dang / khang pa
204b7(nyi khri): dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang
205a1(nyi khri): gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so/ / 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas la
205a2(nyi khri): dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rnams chung ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so// mi snyan par
205a3(nyi khri): mi zer zhing mi smod la snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas/ seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so//
205a4(nyi khri): na pa rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas
205a5(nyi khri): so/ / skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor ba dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / brgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang/ gtsug lag khang bya ba la
205a6(nyi khri): sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pas/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas
205a7(nyi khri): so/ / yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras pas/ ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung
205b1(nyi khri): mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ / gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par gyur pa dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung
205b2(nyi khri): ba dang / btang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spangs shing dus su sma smra bas/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis
205b3(nyi khri): mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/ / rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho yongs su dag pas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor lnga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas
205b4(nyi khri): so/ / yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra smra bas/ tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste// de ni 'khor dbyer ma phyed pa'i snga ltas so// yang gis
205b5(nyi khri): 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la/ mi chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i
205b6(nyi khri): snga ltas so/ / rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di
205b7(nyi khri): lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen
206a1(nyi khri): bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog sdum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs
206a2(nyi khri): dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
206a3(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
206a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa
206a5(nyi khri): stertsa la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad
206a6(nyi khri): las grol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/
206a7(nyi khri): glang ba'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni min
206b1(nyi khri): khyu mchog ste/ bya mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsdu
206b2(nyi khri): na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par
206b3(nyi khri): dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
206b4(nyi khri): rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
206b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam
206b6(nyi khri): par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang
206b7(nyi khri): ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
207a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sgyu zhum pa med
207a2(nyi khri): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/
207a3(nyi khri): sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/
207a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma
207a5(nyi khri): mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
207a6(nyi khri): rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
207a7(nyi khri): rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/
207b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/
207b2(nyi khri): kun tu spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
207b3(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams
207b4(nyi khri): pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo sdum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas
207b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha
207b6(nyi khri): cad yang mi ring ba yin/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam
207b7(nyi khri): pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
208a1(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba'i gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
208a2(nyi khri): ni glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams
208a3(nyi khri): su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems
208a4(nyi khri): mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba
208a5(nyi khri): shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ tshems mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas
208a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs
208a7(nyi khri): pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
208b1(nyi khri): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin//
208b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang / lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na
208b3(nyi khri): chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas
208b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs par gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam
208b5(nyi khri): pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
208b6(nyi khri): snum gyis sems can snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin pa snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/
208b7(nyi khri): snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ skar mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
209a1(nyi khri): sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/
209a2(nyi khri): zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
209a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi khung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu skra bung
209a4(nyi khri): ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu skra sdug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
209a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu skra 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste
209a6(nyi khri): dbu skra ma 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang bral ba ste/ dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag
209a7(nyi khri): spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu skra dri zhim pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang /
209b1(nyi khri): dga' ba 'khyil bas brgyan pa yin/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta
209b2(nyi khri): bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
209b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang
209b4(nyi khri): rmang du byung ba'i chos so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
209b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
209b6(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag
209b7(nyi khri): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad
210a1(nyi khri): sa sa smra / na
210a2(nyi khri): sgyu sa sa du 'byung ba sems pa kyisems dpa sbyi kyis ma sa
210a3(nyi khri): na rgyu dedag gis sa rnaMs thams cadas dus pa med du/ byung chub rnams
210a4(nyi khri): sa / sa sa sa sa
210a5(nyi khri): byor 'jam zung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin po rol tu phyin ba drun pa dang ga gos don mthun pas sems can rnams smang ngo / / 'gram phyir zhen/ 'di skor par 'du phyin pa
210a6(nyi khri): gas dge pa'i chos thams cadus 'dus pa ste n+te/ 'gror pa/ b+h+ya sems dpa' sems pa pa ma ldan pas sems ca rnams snad // ra ra
210a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngomatshar dang rmang du byung ba'i ngas so/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
210b1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'dems shing 'di skad ston to// rigs kyi bu khyed tshur shog/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa
210b2(nyi khri): la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams
210b3(nyi khri): cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/
210b4(nyi khri): yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces chos ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
210b5(nyi khri): chen po nga yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi
210b6(nyi khri): bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na de la sgoms shig/ yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no//
210b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la
211a1(nyi khri): mkhas pas mi ge mang pos yi ge med pa chos ston kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
211a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmang du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
211a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs
211a4(nyi khri): chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
211a5(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam
211a6(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi 'ang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa
211a7(nyi khri): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
211b1(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
211b2(nyi khri): mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/
211b3(nyi khri): de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dang
211b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
211b5(nyi khri): can mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so// ba
211b6(nyi khri): byang bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
211b7(nyi khri): par shes pa ma mchis so/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so// mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so/
212a1(nyi khri): dpe byad bzang po brgyad du ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
212a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba yang lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
212a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi nang stong
212a4(nyi khri): pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o// phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par
212a5(nyi khri): bya'o/ / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog dang /
212a6(nyi khri): 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shing bdag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang /
212a7(nyi khri): tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
212b1(nyi khri): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
212b2(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
212b3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po/
212b4(nyi khri): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
212b5(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas
212b6(nyi khri): kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
212b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad spong bar mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa
213a1(nyi khri): de ltar ston to/ / des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang la yang 'khrug par mi byed gnyis su mi byed do// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang
213a2(nyi khri): ston par byed do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa bye ba phrag du mar sprul cing / sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims
213a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
213a4(nyi khri): sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi dang / la la tshad med pa bzhi dang / la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor/ la la
213a5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / la la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
213a6(nyi khri): la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
213a7(nyi khri): la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / la la byams pa chen po dang / la la snying rje chen po dang / la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
213b1(nyi khri): la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / la la dgra bcom pa nyid dang / la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
213b2(nyi khri): bar la sbyor na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
213b3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci/
213b4(nyi khri): log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol
213b5(nyi khri): ba tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma
213b6(nyi khri): grol ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams
213b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba ga' yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba dang
214a1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na
214a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
214a3(nyi khri): chen po ni chos rnams mi dmigs pa la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa
214a4(nyi khri): nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do//
214a5(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so// rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so// gzhan gyi dngos
214a6(nyi khri): po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la yang mi gnas so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
214a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod
214b1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags
214b2(nyi khri): pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de
214b3(nyi khri): ngag gis kyang chos nyid de dang de'i rjes su rtogs te/ chos de nyid de'i rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
214b4(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do/ / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin med do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
214b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la yang 'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis
214b6(nyi khri): na ci lags/ 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
214b7(nyi khri): pas rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/
215a1(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//
215a2(nyi khri): gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang
215a3(nyi khri): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
215a4(nyi khri): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang 'ag pa
215a5(nyi khri): mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
215a6(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos
215a7(nyi khri): rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten/ dkar le'i chos rnams
215b1(nyi khri): kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi/ dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam
215b2(nyi khri): par smin pa mi gnag cing dkar ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rma
215b3(nyi khri): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar bya ste/ 'bras bu rnam
215b4(nyi khri): par dgod par bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ tha snyad med pa ste/
215b5(nyi khri): 'di ltar ming bden pa dang / gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
215b6(nyi khri): dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden par
215b7(nyi khri): ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang
216a1(nyi khri): byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa
216a2(nyi khri): 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam
216a3(nyi khri): rang byang chub pam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa yang ma'/ 2
216a4(nyi khri): sgom pa yang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta ga la 'ong / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod/ lam sgom pa yang yod pas na/ de'i
216a5(nyi khri): phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/
216a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bya ba med do// rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu
216a7(nyi khri): thob pa med dang lam gyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba yang med do/ / lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
216b1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod par byed de/ 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam/
216b2(nyi khri): par dgod par mi byed do// gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan
216b3(nyi khri): 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i
216b4(nyi khri): chacan gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams
216b5(nyi khri): cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo/ / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan
216b6(nyi khri): 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
216b7(nyi khri): bka' stsal la/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'am/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med
217a1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma
217a2(nyi khri): bgyis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
217a3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig
217a4(nyi khri): tu chud par gyur na de'i tshe 'dus byas she 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes chos gang la yang ris su gcod pa yod ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
217a5(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
217a6(nyi khri): du nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos mi ston to// de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/
217a7(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum
217b1(nyi khri): pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje 'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas
217b2(nyi khri): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
217b3(nyi khri): sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ lam rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
217b4(nyi khri): bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
217b5(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/
217b6(nyi khri): rnams sam mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
217b7(nyi khri): bar ram/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang la yang chags pa med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin
218a1(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul
218a2(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas
218a3(nyi khri): pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi
218a4(nyi khri): 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'dus byas dang
218a5(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la yang gnas pa 'am/
218a6(nyi khri): chags pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par bsgrubs
218a7(nyi khri): pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis so// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rje
218b1(nyi khri): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang /
218b2(nyi khri): sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do// bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
218b3(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
218b4(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams
218b5(nyi khri): cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
218b6(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
218b7(nyi khri): ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
219a1(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byabs pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam pa thams
219a2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang
219a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam tho
219a4(nyi khri): re dgu pa/ / // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khon/
219a5(nyi khri): ba na yang mi gda' na/ lam bsgom du ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon
219a6(nyi khri): mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom
219a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos//
219b1(nyi khri): po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol/
219b2(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sa ma/ bcom
219b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang sprul pa lta bu'o// gsol pa//
219b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa ni
219b5(nyi khri): gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las grol bar 'gyur ba'i
219b6(nyi khri): balnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' se
219b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyangs spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam// gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lba 'am/ mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can
220a1(nyi khri): gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems//
220a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen mos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs
220a3(nyi khri): so/ / sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs
220a4(nyi khri): la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
220a5(nyi khri): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
220a6(nyi khri): babar la spyod pa lags de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi bar gyi lam la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can
220a7(nyi khri): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub
220b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/ rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur
220b2(nyi khri): ma shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
220b3(nyi khri): dag par byed do/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mig yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom
220b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams gyen du spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
220b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
220b6(nyi khri): cing / de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du skyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming
220b7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo bur du ming gis sgro btags pa'o// 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes/
221a1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/
221a2(nyi khri): sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ mi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/
221a3(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom
221a4(nyi khri): pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor ming thams cad ni ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/
221a5(nyi khri): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
221a6(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni yongs su rtogs pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la
221a7(nyi khri): mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes sprul par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas
221b1(nyi khri): sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no/ / rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
221b2(nyi khri): gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzan
221b3(nyi khri): pa 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba gang la chos thams cad skad cig ma las kun tu rtogs pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i
221b4(nyi khri): mtshar ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub
221b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bathabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/
221b6(nyi khri): ras kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya bar gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
221b7(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol pa// gal te chos 'di dag thams cad
222a1(nyi khri): ni de tsam du bas te/ ming dang mtshan mar bas la btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su btags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
222a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chod kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa
222a3(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ / sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni//
222a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par thob par yang mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di
222a5(nyi khri): ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang med/ dngos po yang med pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma med pa'i
222a6(nyi khri): tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
222a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
222b1(nyi khri): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
222b2(nyi khri): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
222b3(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
222b4(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
222b5(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i
222b6(nyi khri): tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
222b7(nyi khri): bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dag pa'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung
223a1(nyi khri): du na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon gcig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
223a2(nyi khri): thams cad mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog
223a3(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
223a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma
223a5(nyi khri): mchis shing / dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni
223a6(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/ / 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag/
223a7(nyi khri): ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs
223b1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos so zhes ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la gnyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/
223b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'
223b3(nyi khri): gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi
223b4(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo// byang chub sems
223b5(nyi khri): pa'i chos so/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs nges na/ 'di
223b6(nyi khri): ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel lo
223b7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
224a1(nyi khri): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan/
224a2(nyi khri): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
224a3(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
224a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo//
224a5(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do// de ci'i
224a6(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma med
224a7(nyi khri): pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la
224b1(nyi khri): slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob ma yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin
224b2(nyi khri): rang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
224b3(nyi khri): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang
224b4(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
224b5(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
224b6(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
224b7(nyi khri): bar la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
225a1(nyi khri): tshe nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
225a2(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba 'am/ gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa 'am/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin par rab tu shes so// de la ji ltar na
225a3(nyi khri): gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu pa'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu gse tshags dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs
225a4(nyi khri): shes pa yin no/ / ji ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/
225a5(nyi khri): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
225a6(nyi khri): nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/
225a7(nyi khri): de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa lta mnas
225b1(nyi khri): pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du
225b2(nyi khri): yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/
225b3(nyi khri): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin
225b4(nyi khri): nyid du gnas pa ste/ de phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na smig rgyu la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar
225b5(nyi khri): shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong/
225b6(nyi khri): gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/
225b7(nyi khri): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas
226a1(nyi khri): pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chu shing shun pa so sor phye na
226a2(nyi khri): snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba
226a3(nyi khri): med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du bye
226a4(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin// 'phel ba ma yin te/
226a5(nyi khri): phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di ltas
226a6(nyi khri): dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na
226a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa
226b1(nyi khri): sde de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ / ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin na na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi ste mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro
226b2(nyi khri): ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//
226b3(nyi khri): de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams ni phyi'i chos rnams kyis
226b4(nyi khri): stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams
226b5(nyi khri): kyang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
226b6(nyi khri): yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
226b7(nyi khri): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par
227a1(nyi khri): shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa
227a2(nyi khri): ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no// de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa
227a3(nyi khri): rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ te ji ltar
227a4(nyi khri): na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba'i 'phags
227a5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bal shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa
